description:
Aria is a volatile girl who’s top dog in assault at a school for young mercenaries. When she discovers her classmate Kinji’s an ace, she strong-arms him into being her partner, but she isn’t the only femme fatale who wants a taste of his combat skills. His secret? He’s only a hotshot when he’s turned on! Aria gets Kinji for one mission, but he’ll end up with more than one finger on his trigger!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

title.native: 緋弾のアリア 武偵が来たりて温泉研修

node.description:
The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TkashiWatanabe)

Joined Top Craft as an animator while still attending university, switched his focus to directing in the late '80s.

Married to [Miyata Naomi](https://anilist.co/staff/220081/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/TkashiWatanabe)

Joined Top Craft as an animator while still attending university, switched his focus to directing in the late '80s.

Married to [Miyata Naomi](https://anilist.co/staff/220081/).

__[Website](http://www.danet.ne.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/daisukeasakura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/daisuke_asakura/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/daisukeasakura.official)__

__Birthplace:__ Taito Ward, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Tokyo Metropolitan Kuramae Technical High School

__Daisuke Asakura__, alternatively known as DA, is a Japanese vocalist, music producer, orchestrator, composer and arranger.

__[Website](http://www.danet.ne.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/daisukeasakura) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/daisuke_asakura/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/daisukeasakura.official)__

__Birthplace:__ Taito Ward, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Tokyo Metropolitan Kuramae Technical High School

__Daisuke Asakura__, alternatively known as DA, is a Japanese vocalist, music producer, orchestrator, composer and arranger.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sushio_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sushiogumicompany/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%99%E3%81%97%E3%81%8A)

Ishizaki Toshio, better known as Sushio, is an animator, illustrator and character designer working for [Trigger](https://anilist.co/studio/803/).

After graduating from Yoyogi Animation Academy, he joined [Gainax](https://anilist.co/studio/6/). He debuted as an in-betweener in [Neon Genesis Evangelion](https://anilist.co/anime/30/), as a key animator on [Berserk](https://anilist.co/anime/33/), and as an animation director on [Mahoromatic](https://anilist.co/anime/276/). In 2007, he served as a character designer for the first time on [Kiss Dum: Engage Planet](https://anilist.co/anime/2106/). He was a key staff member at Gainax for a long time, but left in 2011 when [Hiroyuki Imaishi](https://anilist.co/staff/97349/) and others established the anime production company Trigger. There he was given the job of handling the character designs for [Kill la Kill](https://anilist.co/anime/18679/), the first TV series produced by the newly-found studio.

Specializes in action and effects, and his skills attract a lot of attention in the industry.

Took part as a key animator on Quentin Tarantino's "Kill Bill: Vol. 1" in 2003.

(Source: Wikipedia)

Their younger brother is the mangaka [Yoshikazu Amami](https://anilist.co/staff/137228/Yoshikazu-Amami).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/akamatsuc) | [Official Website](http://akamatsuc.seesaa.net/)
She made her anime debut in Dance in the Vampire Bund. She sung the anime's OP, Friends.    Blog: http://ameblo.jp/aiko-nakano0710/  Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/AikoNakano710

Youhei Suzuki is a director and former director of photography formerly working for [J.C.Staff](https://anilist.co/studio/7/JC-Staff). Currently freelance.

Not to be confused with the producer of the same name Youhei Suzuki (鈴木洋平).
